posts.post_title: FS:  Evers with bat Cubs on shirt and Reulback throwing, factory 42
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bernie
Evers is a SGC 40, blue background, piedmont 150 factory 25 back.
Reulbach is raw, would likely grade good to very good, Sweet Cap 350-460 factory 42 back.

Email me if you are interested and I'll send you scans.  I tried to upload them onto here, but they're showing up way too small.
